programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 2)

programme.title: Hakudoshi está planejando tomar o lugar de Naraku. Ele rouba os fragmentos da Jóia Shikon de Kagome e seduz Kagura para trair Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Após curar suas feridas infligidas por Naraku, usando a alma de Midoriko, Kikyo encontra novamente Inuyasha e revela o segredo para destruir Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: É o dia do anual Exame de Promoção de Demônio Raposa. Miroku e seus amigos ficam presos nos testes. Shippo tira sarro de Inuyasha e sobe no ranking.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O ferreiro Toshu forjou uma lâmina de demônio usando uma das escamas de Ryujin, e a Dakki nasceu. Toda vez que Inuyasha tenta atacar, ele é prejudicado pela energia demoníaca.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga de Escamas de Dragão

programme.title: O Tetsusaiga atingiu o poder das escamas de dragão. A fim de poder usar rapidamente o poder demoníaco, Inuyasha não tem escolha a não ser passar por treinamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salvá-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausoléu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela também tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Os Dragões De Camelot, (2013, Action)

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: A jornada mágica de Emily, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua mãe a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Action)

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: The Raven, (1963, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: The sorcerer Craven learns from fellow magician Dr. Bedlo that his supposedly dead wife is alive and living at the castle of master sorcerer Dr. Scarabus.

programme.title: House On Haunted Hill, (1959, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death, (1964, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When the sadistic prince (Vincent Price) finds that the Red Death has arrived in the village he rules, he forsakes his people and hides in his castle with his fellow aristocrats…until a mysterious stranger turns his haven into a danse macabre!

programme.title: The Pit and the Pendulum, (1961, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Vincent Price slowly goes crazy because he thinks his wife was buried alive (a plot between his wife and her lover to get his money). Now totally insane, he starts to murder.

programme.title: Last Man On Earth, (1964, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: Vincent Price is the only survivor after a plague wipes out the human race, and struggles with loneliness. Restored and In Color!

programme.title: Odds Against Tomorrow, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: When bigoted ex-con Earl Slater agrees to carry out a heist with a disgraced former cop and his cohorts – one of whom is Black – tensions mount as the job comes together, until Earl’s seething hatred erupts, risking the heist...and their lives!

programme.title: Steamboat Bill Jr., (1928, Action)
programme.desc: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: The Defiant Ones, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: In Stanley Kramer's cinema classic, screen legends Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis star as two convicts on the run from a Southern work gang who are bound together by an unbreakable iron chain and separated by an unbridled hatred for each other.

programme.title: Lilies Of The Field, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards® including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar® for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in KILL BILL; VOL. 1; as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Katie disappeared with her nephew Hunter with no survivors. Five years later she's returned with a mysterious boy, ready to target new victims with her demonic rage in a quiet neighborhood.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his soul.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: The Messengers, (2007, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Slice, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: In a spooky small town, when a slew of pizza delivery boys are slain on the job, two daring survivors (Atlanta's Zazie Beetz and Chance the Rapper in a wild film debut) set out to catch the culprits behind the cryptic crime spree.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Candyman: Day of the Dead, (1999, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: The living descendant of Candyman tries to put an end to the vengeful spirit's murderous legacy in this latest installment of the hit horror series.

programme.title: Def By Temptation, (1990, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: An evil succubus is preying on libidinous black men in New York City, and all that stands in her way is a minister-in-training, an aspiring actor, and a cop who specializes in cases involving the supernatural.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Live & Smokin', (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor live comedy performance at the Improvisation in New York City.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bus driver Ralph Kramden and sanitation engineer Ed Norton are best friends who dream of making it big. Their most recent “get-rich-quick” plan finds the boys out to make their fortune by hiring a dog trainer to race their pet greyhound.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story III, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Swordsman Yen and Leslie Cheung characters are replaced by a Buddhist Abbot and disciple (Tony Leung). Jacky Cheung also pops up again, this time as a money-grabbing swordsman with a neat bag of tricks.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Rampant, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: Yakuza Apocalypse, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: Fearsome yakuza boss Kamiura is also a bloodsucking vampire. One day, men arrive from a competing clan and deliver him an ultimatum: Play nice or die. Kamiura refuses and, during a fierce battle, is torn limb from limb.

programme.title: Fist of Fury, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: Slaughter In San Francisco [English-Language Version], (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American cop, skilled in martial arts, battles the most powerful criminal gang in San Francisco that is responsible for the death of his partner.

programme.title: Good Guys Wear Black, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Chuck Norris stars as John T. Booker, the former leader of an elite commando unit who must uncover the reason why his former squad members are being systematically murdered one by one. Anne Archer and James Franciscus co-star.

programme.title: A Force Of One, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: In this thrill-a-minute film, action superstar Chuck Norris stars as a martial arts champion enlisted to help track down a serial killer...and the man responsible for the murder of his adoptive son. Jennifer O'Neill and Clu Gulager also star.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith — a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Summer Rental, (1984, Screwball)
programme.desc: Comedy sensation John Candy plays the stressed-out air traffic controller whose much-needed family holiday yields one hysterical misadventure after another.

programme.title: Canadian Bacon, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Falling approval ratings and a sagging economy, cause a desperate U.S. president to turn America against its most unlikely enemy, Canada. A Niagara Falls sheriff and his band of misfit deputies invade Canada leaving the President's plans in shambles.

programme.title: Delirious, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a soap opera writer bumps his head and wakes up in the midst of his own daytime serial, he writes himself into the storyline of a lifetime!

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: They came for gold, but now they'll settle for indoor plumbing. John Candy and Richard Lewis star in this hilariously unconventional look at the legendary West.

programme.title: Canadian Bacon, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Falling approval ratings and a sagging economy, cause a desperate U.S. president to turn America against its most unlikely enemy, Canada. A Niagara Falls sheriff and his band of misfit deputies invade Canada leaving the President's plans in shambles.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: The coming-of-age of three best friends who work at a pizzeria in the seaside town of Mystic, Connecticut.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Now a rising lawyer, Elle Woods is about to make partner at her firm, she and Emmett are still love, and her hair is still healthy. Elle heads to D.C. and take matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: An Unfinished Life, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Einar Gilkyson (Robert Redford) lives in the Wyoming ranchlands with his only friend, Mitch (Morgan Freeman). Then, suddenly, the woman he blames for his son's death arrives at his door broke, desperate, and with a granddaughter he's never known.

programme.title: Georgia Rule, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A troubled young woman is sent to live with her grandmother for the summer, while hiding a secret that could potentially tear her family apart.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also A Star, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: The Sun Is Also a Star is an epic romance about two teenagers (Charles Melton and Yara Shahidi), who meet —and fall for each other—on one fateful day amidst the fervor and flurry of New York City as Natasha fights against her family’s deportation.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Horror)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in a war between two immortal clans.

programme.title: Frankenstein, (2004, Horror)
programme.desc: When a detective begins investigating a series of horrific murders, she is lead to a mad doctor who has sustained his creature and himself for over 200 years through genetic experimentation.

programme.title: Byzantium, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: An insatiable thirst for blood thrusts a beautiful young woman into an exhilarating and deadly new world of dark mysticism and hauntingly intoxicating vampire legends.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: Lila & Eve, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Lila, a grief-stricken mother reeling from her son's murder, attends a support group where she meets Eve, who urges her to take matters into her own hands to track down her son's killers. They soon embark on a journey of revenge, but also recovery.

programme.title: The Ides of March, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Ambition seduces and power corrupts in a nerve-wracking thriller from Academy Award nominated director George Clooney (Good Night, and Good Luck). Rating: R

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what they’ve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who can’t think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.title: Short Term 12, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Short Term 12 follows Grace (Brie Larson), a twenty-something staff member at a foster care facility as she reckons with caring for the teens in her charge and her own past. This lovingly realized film finds truth and humor in unexpected places.

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13

programme.title: The Monuments Men, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: THE MONUMENTS MEN centers around an unlikely World War II platoon, tasked with going into Germany to rescue artistic masterpieces from Nazi thieves and returning them to their rightful owners.

programme.title: American Hustle, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: The Monster Squad, (1987, Horror)
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: The Giver, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the beloved young adult novel. A young man (Brenton Thwaites), who lives in a seemingly ideal world, must escape after discovering the deadly truths of his community’s secret past.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith — a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson has to face spending the holiday with her family.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Surviving Christmas, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: A lonely, obnoxious young millionaire pays a family to spend Christmas with him.

programme.title: Pi, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Max is a genius mathematician who built a supercomputer that provides the key for understanding all existence. Representatives from a Hasidic cabalistic sect and high-powered Wall Street firm hear of the secret and attempt to seduce him.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: In 2047, a team of astronauts embarks on a mission to retrieve a missing spaceship. However, their simple retrieval job leads to something far more terrifying than any of them would suspect.

programme.title: Cube, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Seven complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Dead Ringers, (1988, Thriller)
programme.desc: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

programme.title: Jade, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Corelli is up to his neck in a case that may lead where he doesn't want to go. Chazz Palminteri portrays Matt, an attorney and Corelli's longtime pal. Linda Fiorentino is Matt's wife Trina: a psychologist who's capable of anything, even murder.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends are holed up in a remote cabin, where they discover a Book Of The Dead. They unwittingly summon demons living in the nearby woods, which possess the youngsters in succession until only one is left intact to fight for survival.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: Evil Dead, (2013, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends have found the mysterious and fiercely powerful Book of the Dead, which releases a violent demon on a bloodthirsty quest to possess them all.

programme.title: You're Next, (2014, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Teen Witch, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: She-Devil, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: The author of 32 best-selling romance books takes her accountant away from his frumpy wife. And when this overweight suburban wife discovers what's been going on, she wreaks malicious and delicious revenge...

programme.title: High Spirits, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When a castle-turned-hotel owned by Peter Plunkett falls on hard financial times, he comes up with an idea to turn the place into a tourist attraction by billing it as Europe's most haunted castle.

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Teetering on the edge of sanity, volatile literary agent Peter Loew (Nicolas Cage) tries to find purpose in his life through a cutthroat work ethic and a hedonistic nightlife.

programme.title: Once Bitten, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A centuries-old vampiress comes to Los Angeles and stalks male virgins, she needs their blood to retain her youth and beauty. Her targets are left with an appetite for raw hamburgers and a tendency to sleep during the day so as to avoid sunlight.

programme.title: Teen Wolf, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teenage boy's incredible werewolf powers improve the quality of his life in dramatic and hilarious ways.

programme.title: Teen Wolf Too, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The further comedic adventuress of a teenage werewolf as Todd Howard's younger werewolf cousin goes to college on a sports scholarship.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all, destroyes the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: Eagle Eye, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers trying to escape danger when they are ripped from their ordinary lives and 'activated' as part of a hightech assassination plot.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimaru’s lair with Sasuke in hand. They’re discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobo’s Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
