programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Chinese emigrant (Justin Chon) and his best friend (Kevin Wu) rise through the ranks of one of New York's most-powerful street gangs.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Eden Lake, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: You're Next, (2014, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: The House of the Devil, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Desperate for quick cash, college sophomore Samantha Hughes takes a babysitting job in the isolated mansion of the creepy Ulman family. Samantha has no idea that a nightmare of unspeakable fear and torment awaits her within these walls.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Don't Look Now, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: On a trip to Venice, a young couple whose daughter has just died meet a psychic who leads them into a frightening and suspenseful experience. Based on a novel by Daphne Du Maurier.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: In 2047, a team of astronauts embarks on a mission to retrieve a missing spaceship. However, their simple retrieval job leads to something far more terrifying than any of them would suspect.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: The Arrival, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down The Lane, (1976, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Jodie Foster and Martin Sheen star in this haunting story of a thirteen-year-old girl who lives in an old house with her reclusive father...all alone. Or does she? It seems she is hiding a dark secret, one she is determined to preserve. At any cost!

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: Black Christmas, (1974, Horror)
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls is stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: Don't Look Now, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: On a trip to Venice, a young couple whose daughter has just died meet a psychic who leads them into a frightening and suspenseful experience. Based on a novel by Daphne Du Maurier.

programme.title: Wicker Man, (1973, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: When a young girl mysteriously disappears, police sergeant Howie travels to a remote Scottish island to investigate. But this pastoral community, led by the strange Lord Summerisle, is not at all what it seems.

programme.title: Carrie, (1976, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this all-time horror classic, Carrie (Sissy Spacek) is a loner with no confidence and no friends. When pushed too far, Carrie becomes a vengeance-seeking powerhouse who causes all hell to break loose in a frenzy of blood, fire and brimstone!

programme.title: The Man Who Fell To Earth, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS + MORIA / THE MOST HEINOUS COMBINATION OF BRAINS AND BRAWN

programme.title: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET PLAN TO TURN THE TABLES / NIGHTMARE LUFFY MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HAT CREW GETS WIPED OUT / THE SHADOW-SHADOW'S POWERS IN FULL SWING

programme.title: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INCREDIBLE BATTLE STARTS! LUFFY VS. LUFFY

programme.title: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE END OF THE BATTLE IS NIGH! POUND IN THE FINISHING MOVE

programme.title: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OUR BODIES VANISH! THE MORNING SUN SHINES ON THE NIGHTMARISH ISLAND!

programme.title: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NOT OUT OF DANGER YET! ORDERS TO ANNIHILATE THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends – and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AND ACE! THE STORY OF HOW THE BROTHERS MET!

programme.title: The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death - or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SABO! THE BOY AT THE GRAY TERMINAL!

programme.title: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight – even when he's outnumbered!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WON'T RUN! ACE'S DESPERATE RESCUE OPERATION!

programme.title: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend's past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE SEA SOMEDAY! THE PLEDGE OF THE THREE BRATS!

programme.title: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LEAVING THE DADAN FAMILY FOR GOOD?! THE KIDS' HIDEOUT HAS BEEN BUILT!

programme.title: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that's been stealing their food. Ace gets angry when his father's identity is revealed. Sabo's parents hire pirates to track down their son!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BECOMING AN APPRENTICE?! A MAN WHO FOUGHT AGAINST THE KING OF THE PIRATES!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Underworld, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: In the Underworld, Vampires are a secret clan of modern aristocratic sophisticates whose mortal enemies are the Lycans (werewolves), a shrewd gang of street thugs who prowl the city's underbelly.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

programme.title: Underworld Awakening, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: As the war between the Death Dealers and the Lycans rages on, Selene (Beckinsale), the vampire warrior, and Michael (Speedman), the werewolf hybrid, work together in an effort to unlock the secrets of their respective bloodlines.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma, (1946, Drama)
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and his gang are all involved in a murder mystery involving the death of a wealthy ranch owner.

programme.title: My Pal Trigger, (1946, Drama)
programme.desc: Roy Rogers goes to jail after hes wrongly accused of killing Gabby Hayes horse in this action packed yarn from Republic Pictures.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A silver mine with a secret entrance along the Mexican border is the setting for this typical Roy Rogers western with music.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Bless the Child, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Omens and concepts of good vs. evil have no place in Maggie O'Connor's well-ordered, practical universe. That is until she becomes the caregiver for mankind's last hope - a child who's just turned six.

programme.title: Knowing, (2009, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: A professor (Nicolas Cage) deciphers a mysterious code foretelling future calamities. Can he somehow avert them?

programme.title: Dracula 3000, (2004, Horror)
programme.desc: A salvage ship on a routine mission discovers a transporter vessel that had been reported missing 100 years earlier. When the salvage crew boards the vessel, they discover 50 long black coffins.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett (The Black Dahlia, Pearl Harbor) crosses over to the dark side in this bone-chilling adaptation of the cult-hit graphic novel, brought to the screen in all its demonic glory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch’s ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reika’s chance to study abroad.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Dark Skies, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A couple (Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton) and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Blair Witch, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A group of friends (James Allen McCune, Callie Hernandez, Corbin Reid) and their two guides encounter the legendary Blair Witch while exploring the Black Hills Forest in Maryland.

programme.title: Winchester, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

programme.title: Sinister, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his home's previous occupants.

programme.title: Death of Me, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A vacationing couple must unravel the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other.

programme.title: No One Lives, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Backwoods bandits find they've made a grievous error when they victimize a couple who are not nearly as helpless as they seem.

programme.title: Heist, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When their attempt to rob a gangster's (Robert De Niro) casino goes awry, a desperate man (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) and his partner (Dave Bautista) hijack a city bus to escape from the police and a maniacal thug (Morris Chestnut).

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Thieves (Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen) ponder the identity of the traitor in their midst in the violent aftermath of a failed jewelry heist.

programme.title: Den of Thieves, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An elite unit of the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department squares off against a crew of ex-military men who hatch an elaborate plan for a seemingly impossible heist -- the city's Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Screwball)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Screwball)
programme.desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny (Adam Sandler) finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, wild bus drivers, cops on skis and 400 costumed party crashers, sometimes crazy follows you.

programme.title: Valkyrie, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: In WWII, a group of German officers plots to assassinate Hitler and seize control of the military command to end the war. The operation was codenamed "Valkyrie", for the plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: Magnolia, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: This sprawling character study follows 10 people whose damaged lives intersect—often by sheer coincidence—during a single day in Southern California's San Fernando Valley.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun
programme.desc: The Harvest Festival comes to an end.

programme.title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun
programme.desc: The Legend Leaf explodes in the sky.

programme.desc: The instructors get together at a pub to celebrate.

programme.title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun

programme.title: Witchblade

programme.title: Witchblade

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: The Doji Group wants Masane to deal with the rogue X-Cons stalking the streets of Tokyo; in exchange for her work, Takayama guarantees Masane a new life with her daughter.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Masane's role as the Doji Group's weapon comes with a new home, but security and comfort fade when she learns another powerful entity, the NSWF, seeks possession of the Witchblade.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Masane can finally provide for Rihoko after pressing the Doji Group for a new salary; the peace of mind might not last now that a reporter named Tozawa follows a new lead: the Witchblade.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: The Doji Group rescues Masane from the ravaging hands of her clone contemporaries; as she gets whisked away, a savage assailant gives chase.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: After Shiori's sanity crumbles, she attacks the ship carrying Masane; when the battle ends, the true destiny of those who bear the blade comes into harsh focus.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: A new model of X-Con kills in ways that none have before, and with Masane along for the ride, Tozawa becomes a willing participant in the hunt for the monsters.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Tozawa and Masane investigate a strange string of murders, and hope the crimes have no relation to the lonely man recently befriended by Rihoko.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: After Masane gets spotted during a fight, she must attend a fancy dinner party as punishment.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Rihoko falls ill and must be tended to by someone besides her mother; after battling the Cloneblade Nora, Masane finds herself in the hands of the NSWF, with Father waiting.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: The NSWF studies the captive Masane, looking for insight into the relationship between bearer and blade; the agency gets a much closer look at the Witchblade's power than they expected.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Masane and Rihoko go on the run after the Child Welfare Ministry attempts to use DNA evidence to separate mother and daughter; Dr. Nishida tasks Nora with hunting them down.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: As Reina and Rihoko's relationship suffers, Masane's mental state suffers too; Maria rises to the challenge and embraces the Cloneblades.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Reina and Masane rush to save Rihoko from Maria's jealous rage, but the action unfortunately attracts the attention of every X-Con for miles around.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: As the residents of the Natsuki Building head off for the beach, Takayama warns Masane that Witchblade and Cloneblade alike take severe tolls on the life of the bearer.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Takayama struggles to maintain the upper hand against his rival, Wado; Tozawa digs up all the dirt he can on Father; the Cloneblade project may have goals more sinister than mere profit.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Takayama resigns after claiming responsibility for several high-profile incidents, leaving the Doji Group in Wado's hands; Maria takes over training the new generation of Cloneblades.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Masane and Takayama grow closer after she reaches new levels of lust and rage to protect him; at the NSWF, Father's joy proves short-lived when his latest Cloneblade stages a coup.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Takayama offers reassurance that he will look out for Rihoko if Masane falls in battle; Maria grows even more focused on claiming the Witchblade for herself.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Struggling under the emotional and physical strain of the Witchblade, Masane looks for ways to remove the artifact, but nothing short of death can remove the curse.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: A tender moment between Masane and Rihoko gets interrupted by attacking X-Cons; Maria choses the next Sister to take on the Witchblade; more trouble approaching from offshore.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: Masane and her allies prepare for battle; as three twisted Cloneblades move to take the Witchblade by force, thousands of I-Weapons approach to violently complicate matters.

programme.title: Witchblade
programme.desc: The final battle between the Witchblade and the Cloneblades erupts; consumed with madness, Maria leads her Sisters into a clash with Masane; high atop Tokyo Tower, everyone faces their destiny.

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
programme.desc: Noé searches for the "Book of Vanitas" and meets a questionable stranger aboard an airship to Paris.
programme.sub-title: In the Event of Rusty Hopes

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
programme.desc: Vanitas and Noé are in a bind until an invitation arrives; at their benefactor's, they find they must prove the Book of Vanitas can restore a vampire's true name.

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
programme.desc: The battle between Vanitas and the Hellfire Witch takes an unexpected turn; Vanitas and Noé return to Count Orlok to learn their fate.

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
programme.desc: The Teacher explains the World Formula theory; Vanitas is put off by Noé and Dominique's relationship; Vanitas encounters Jeanne again and reveals himself to the ball guests.

programme.title: The Skulls III, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A young woman (Clare Kramer) gets more than she bargained for when she gains entrance to a males-only secret society.

programme.title: The Spider Woman Strikes Back, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: She (Gale Sondergaard) and her hulking servant grow bloodsucking plants, as a young woman (Brenda Joyce) finds out.

programme.title: Stephanie, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: After a mysterious global catastrophe, a young girl is left alone to hide from a malevolent power that stalks her home.

programme.title: Virus, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Passengers (Jamie Lee Curtis, William Baldwin, Donald Sutherland) on a sinking ship board a seemingly deserted Russian vessel containing a mutating alien force.

programme.title: Visions, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: After moving to a vineyard with her family, a pregnant woman experiences horrifying visions.

programme.title: Wer, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: In France, an American female attorney (A.J. Cook) defends a murder suspect who has a brutish appearance and a deadly secret.

programme.title: White Noise 2: The Light, (1970, Paranormal)
